source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT 
a.sku
,a.mate_nm
,a.due_dt
,a.main_comp
,a.main_comp2
,a.rpst_img
,a.stop_stat_all
,a.reg_yn
,a.pl_code_g_nm
,a.pl_code_p_nm
,a.img_s
,a.hitcnt
,a.use_yn
,a.upd_dt
,a.reg_dt
,a.plm_flag
,a.label_img
,a.alg_info3
,a.alg_info5
,a.alg_info6
,b.role_script
,b.sell_point
,b.food_type
,b.cptt_1st_good
,b.cptt_vs_fort
FROM CD_WEITEM.TB_PRDT_INFO_SKU_MASTER a, CD_WEITEM.TB_PRDT_INFO_MASTER  b
WHERE a.sku = b.sku(+)

query.value:
delete from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod a
where exists ( select 1 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2 where tag = a.tag);

insert into  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod
(
 tag
	,short 
	,long 
	,display_order
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num
	,hier_name
	,hier_level_num 
	,hier_level_name
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 	
	,manufacturer 
	,brand 
	,"type"
	,"size"
	,item 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h2_0 
	,typed 
	,kimchi_package_0
	,package 
	,kimchi_size_0 
	,kimchi_type_size_0 
    ,kimchi_mn_package_0 
	,typeb
	,ifyyyymm
)
select 
    tag
	,short 
	,long 
	,display_order
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num
	,hier_name
	,hier_level_num 
	,hier_level_name
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 	
	,manufacturer 
	,brand 
	,"type"
	,"size"
	,item 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h2_0 
	,typed 
	,kimchi_package_0
	,package 
	,kimchi_size_0 
	,kimchi_type_size_0 
    ,kimchi_mn_package_0 
	,typeb
	,'@{variables('yyyymm')}' ifyyyymm
from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2;



delete from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_history
 where  ifyyyymm = '@{variables('yyyymm')}';

insert into  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_history
(
    tag
	,short 
	,long 
	,display_order
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num
	,hier_name
	,hier_level_num 
	,hier_level_name
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 	
	,manufacturer 
	,brand 
	,"type"
	,"size"
	,item 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h2_0 
	,typed 
	,kimchi_package_0
	,package 
	,kimchi_size_0 
	,kimchi_type_size_0 
    ,kimchi_mn_package_0 
	,typeb
	,ifyyyymm
)
select   tag
	,short 
	,long 
	,display_order
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num
	,hier_name
	,hier_level_num 
	,hier_level_name
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 	
	,manufacturer 
	,brand 
	,"type"
	,"size"
	,item 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h2_0 
	,typed 
	,kimchi_package_0
	,package 
	,kimchi_size_0 
	,kimchi_type_size_0 
    ,kimchi_mn_package_0 
	,typeb
	,'@{variables('yyyymm')}' ifyyyymm
 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2 ;

 select 1 su

activities.name: Set yyyymm
activities.description:
수행일 기준 전월 구하기
포멧 : yyyymm

query.value:
select string_agg('{  "source": { "name": "'||a.sour||'", "type": "String" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.sink||'", "type": "String", "physicalType": "character varying" } }'
              ,',') as json
  from (
		select distinct column_name as sour
		      ,case when column_name lIke 'CSTM%' and hierarchy_level = '1' then 'category'
		            else lower(hierarchy_level_name)
		         end sink
		 from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_offline_hier_temp
		 where data_type ='@{item().fileName}'
		  union all 
		select 'hierarchy_number','hierarchy_number' union all
		select 'hierarchy_level','hierarchy_level'   union all
		select 'hierarchy_level_name','hierarchy_level_name' 	
	) a

preCopyScript.value:
delete from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_offline_fct
where ifyyyymm = '@{variables('yyyymm')}'
  and data_type = '@{item().fileName}'

query.value:
select string_agg('{  "source": { "name": "'||a.sour||'", "type": "String" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.sink||'", "type": "String", "physicalType": "character varying" } }'
      ,',') as json
  from (  
		select fact_column as sour
		      ,lower(fact_column) as sink
		 from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_offline_fct	 
		 where  data_type ='@{item().fileName}'
		  and ifyyyymm = '@{pipeline().parameters.pip_yyyymm}'
	    ) a

query.value:
select string_agg('{  "source": { "name": "'||a.sour||'", "type": "String" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.sink||'", "type": "String", "physicalType": "character varying" } }'
              ,',') as json
  from (
		select distinct column_name as sour
		      ,case when column_name lIke 'CSTM%' and hierarchy_level = '1' then 'category'
		            else lower(hierarchy_level_name)
		         end sink
		 from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_online_hier_temp	
		  union all 
		select 'hierarchy_number','hierarchy_number' union all
		select 'hierarchy_level','hierarchy_level'   union all
		select 'hierarchy_level_name','hierarchy_level_name' 	
	) a

select string_agg('{  "source": { "name": "'||a.sour||'", "type": "String" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.sink||'", "type": "String", "physicalType": "character varying" } }'
      ,',') as json
  from (  
		select fact_column as sour
		      ,lower(fact_column) as sink
		 from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_online_fct	 
		 where ifyyyymm = '@{pipeline().parameters.pip_yyyymm}'
	    ) a

source.query:
select distinct group_id from cd_ods.tb_azure_group_info
where snapshot_date =CURRENT_DATE-1

select distinct user_id from cd_ods.tb_azure_user_info
where snapshot_date =CURRENT_DATE

activities.name: Execute_Update
activities.description: DAYS 사용자 라이선스 정보 일일 적재

properties.description:
- 초기 적재시, 월별로 모든 파일 Sink
- 증분컬럼이 DATE 형식

query.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ')) STARTDT FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' ORDER BY STARTDT')
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = ','DATE(''', item().STARTDT, ''')')
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY)')

properties.description:
- 초기 적재시, 월별로 모든 파일 Sink
- 증분컬럼이 DATE 형식

query.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ')) STARTDT FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' ORDER BY STARTDT')
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = ','DATE(''', item().STARTDT, ''')')
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL ',pipeline().parameters.date,' DAY)')
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL ',pipeline().parameters.date,' DAY)')

@concat('SELECT sd_id,
 replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(sd_name,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as sd_name,
 sd_url,
 site,
 site_id,
 sd_itemid,
 sd_reviewid,
 sd_brand,
 sd_maker,
 sd_ingredients,
 replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(sd_volume,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as sd_volume,
 sd_category,
 sd_low_price,
 sd_review_cnt,
 sd_rate,
 sd_low_store,
 sd_store_cnt,
 sd_crawl_time
  FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)

@concat('SELECT sd_id,
 replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(sd_name,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as sd_name,
 sd_url,
 site,
 site_id,
 sd_itemid,
 sd_reviewid,
 sd_brand,
 sd_maker,
 sd_ingredients,
 replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(sd_volume,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as sd_volume,
 sd_category,
 sd_low_price,
 sd_review_cnt,
 sd_rate,
 sd_low_store,
 sd_store_cnt,
 sd_crawl_time
  FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
